nodes.text: In 3.5 ABY, Dark Prince Xizor of the Black Sun crime syndicate ended his relationship with one of his many mistresses, leaving her with an extravagant dwelling in Coruscant's Imperial City as a going-away present. As per his relationship custom, Xizor planned to have his personal lieutenant, Guri, bestow upon the ex-mistress a generous severance package, as well as a warning to never attempt to contact Xizor again, lest she be killed for trying to do so.
